mapper.delete: delete from approval_rule where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT ar.* ,fu1.USER_NAME as create_user_name ,fu2.USER_NAME as approval_user_name FROM approval_rule ar LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu1 on ar.create_user = fu1._id LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu2 on ar.approval_user = fu2._id where 1=1 and fu1.create_user_name like '%${create_user_name}%' and fu2.approval_user like '%${approval_user}%' and ar.type=#{type} ORDER BY ar.id desc
SELECT ar.* FROM approval_rule ar where ar.create_user =#{create_user} and ar.type=#{type}
SELECT ar.* FROM approval_rule ar where ar.create_user ='default' and ar.type=#{type}
